SEARCH
Package io.github.thecsdev.betterstats.api.util.io

Interface IStatsProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
IEditableStatsProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalPlayerStatsProvider, RAMStatsProvider
public interface IStatsProvider
A component that contains loaded statistics about a given player.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @Nullable net.minecraft.text.Text
    getDisplayName()
    Returns a "visual"/"user friendly" display Text that will be shown on the GUI screen as an indicator as to who the stats belong to.
    @Nullable com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile
    getGameProfile()
    Returns the GameProfile of the player these stats belong to, or null if these stats are not associated with a player.
    default int
    getPlayerBadgeValue(io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.badge.PlayerBadge playerBadge)
    Returns the Integer value of a given PlayerBadge stat.
    int
    getPlayerBadgeValue(net.minecraft.util.Identifier badgeId)
    Returns the Integer value of a given PlayerBadge stat.
    int
    getStatValue(net.minecraft.stat.Stat<?> stat)
    Returns the Integer value of a given Stat.
    default <T> int
    getStatValue(net.minecraft.stat.StatType<T> type, T stat)
    Returns the Integer value of a given StatType and its corresponding Stat.

  • Method Details

    • getDisplayName

      @Nullable @Nullable net.minecraft.text.Text getDisplayName()
      Returns a "visual"/"user friendly" display Text that will be shown on the GUI screen as an indicator as to who the stats belong to.

    • getGameProfile

      @Nullable @Nullable com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile getGameProfile()
      Returns the GameProfile of the player these stats belong to, or null if these stats are not associated with a player.

    • getStatValue

      int getStatValue(net.minecraft.stat.Stat<?> stat)
      Returns the Integer value of a given Stat.
      Parameters:
      stat - The Stat whose value is to be obtained.
      See Also:
      • StatHandler

    • getStatValue

      default <T> int getStatValue(net.minecraft.stat.StatType<T> type, T stat)
      Returns the Integer value of a given StatType and its corresponding Stat.
      Parameters:
      type - The StatType.
      stat - The Stat whose value is to be obtained.
      See Also:

    • getPlayerBadgeValue

      int getPlayerBadgeValue(net.minecraft.util.Identifier badgeId)
      Returns the Integer value of a given PlayerBadge stat.
      Parameters:
      badgeId - The unique Identifier of the PlayerBadge.

    • getPlayerBadgeValue

      default int getPlayerBadgeValue(io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.badge.PlayerBadge playerBadge) throws NullPointerException
      Returns the Integer value of a given PlayerBadge stat.
      Parameters:
      playerBadge - The given PlayerBadge. Must be registered.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the argument is null, or the PlayerBadge is not registered.
